Sports and Clubs: Cricket, badminton, lawn tennis, shooting and other sports
Social And Cultural Activities: Started a school for poor children; associated with environmental protection and awareness programmes
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Watching movies, listening to old melodies, watching stage shows, takes keen interest in folk dance and music
Special Interests: Interested in the educational field; upliftment of educational institution-academic as well as professional; working as manager of the White Hall Public School, Lucknow.
Educational Qualifications: M.A. Educated at Lucknow University, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh
